abstract: Microsoft says its purchase of Medstory is part of an effort to build a suite of tools and services related to health care.
snippet: Microsoft says its purchase of Medstory is part of an effort to build a suite of tools and services related to health care.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft’s drive into the health care market is just getting under way, but the company signaled yesterday that one important ingredient in its plan will be a specialized search engine tailored to deliver useful medical information to consumers.

headline.main: Microsoft to Buy Health Information Search Engine
headline.print_headline: Microsoft to Buy Health Information Search Engine

abstract: Microsoft‘s drive into the health care market is just getting under way, but the company signaled Monday that one important ingredient in its plan will be a specialized search engine tailored to deliver useful medical information to consumers. Microsoft is buying Medstory, a small start-up in Foster City, Calif., for an undisclosed amount. Its search software applies artificial intelligence techniques to medical and health information in medical journals, government documents and on the Internet.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft‘s drive into the health care market is just getting under way, but the company signaled Monday that one important ingredient in its plan will be a specialized search engine tailored to deliver useful medical information to consumers. headline.main: Microsoft to Buy Health Information Search Engine
